TextView.android:text: Hyatt Regency Dehradun located at the foothills of Himalayas offers 263 rooms across 7 floors, 4 distinctive food & beverage venues each with alfresco seating option, Regency Club, Rooftop Pool, Spa & Salon , Stay Fit Studio and Camp Hyatt. The event spaces of the hotel are spread across 3115 sqm (33500 sq ft), incorporating the magnificent Regency Ballroom, Vista Lawns, 3 spacious Studios, Pinnacle Lounge and one boardroom.

Immerse yourself in the wonders of the natural world at Fairfield by Marriott Dehradun. Located along the cusp of Dehradun, minutes from Rajpur Road, the Mussoorie hill station and the pilgrimage of Char Dhaam Yatra, our hotel places you in the heart of a biodiverse landscape. Explore lush nature trails in rich forests or catch a glimpse of exotic wildlife at the zoo during your visit. Here at the hotel, we offer a sparkling swimming pool, a fitness center and three signature restaurants serving authentic cuisine from India and throughout the world, as well as coffee and cocktails. Host a business gathering or a joyful celebration in one of versatile event venues, which include a scenic outdoor lawn. At the end of a successful day, return to one of our contemporary hotel rooms or suites featuring plenty of natural lighting, high-speed Wi-Fi, plush bedding and postcard-worthy views of our pool deck or the mountain. Restore your balance and embrace the warm hospitality of Fairfield by Marriott Dehradun.
